name: Sam Slapstick and the Case of the Low Readership
name_original: Sam Slapstick and the Case of the Low Readership
description:
Play as Flotsam "Sam" Slapstick, an entity composed of several circus clowns twisted and compressed after a freak accident at a county fair. 

Engage with the locals of the Scrap Heap, the multiverse's refuse pile! Uncover the full story of multiple playthroughs! Do something else to complete the rule of threes! 

There are a lot of options, but a single run through of this game is relatively short. During interviews with the inhabitants of the Scrap Heap, you can chose particular subjects you'd like to know more about, uncovering new clues and routes. Be careful though, some folks don't have all day to talk, so pick your questions wisely.
